channel.title: DGB-PK 24/7 uptime aka storm pk
channel.description:
I am releasing dgb-pk a 24/7 free pk server. This is storm pk source that I received from the owner before released by the other guys.
There are subscriptions but you must get 10 kills to exchange for subtime, or it can be won by event.
Train 1 character and change stats from website control panel.
Forums and client d/l can be found at(forums not complete, you can register and play though) [url=http://dgbpk.sytes.net]http://dgbpk.sytes.net[/url] [img]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/7602/screenshot0p.png[/img] [img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/9343/screenshot1fv.png[/img] [img]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/5246/screenshot2uf.png[/img] [img]http://img851.imageshack.us/img851/8076/screenshot3ee.png[/img] [img]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/6846/screenshot4hj.png[/img]

item.title: DGB-PK 24/7 uptime aka storm pk
item.dc:creator: @Chrix Chrix
item.description:
@Chrix wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:68, topic:427044"][quote author=Chrix link=topic=529744.msg3903022#msg3903022 date=1327950329]

Look, I’m sick of all this grade-school drama when it comes to the RSC section. This is what it comes down to, if you are so childish you would attack (Ddos) anyone else, then I will ban you and delete all of your topics, and censor the URL to your server on this forum. For now, I have proof that ‘rschill.eu’ are attacking another server, right here on their own website:

http://rschill.eu/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=264

(don’t bother taking it down, I saved a backup for proof, and also that picture posted earlier is of this thread)

I’m going to give ‘pkufast’ 24 hours from this post to stop the attack, and if not then I’ll do what I said earlier.

Also, if someone is attacking rschill.eu, then provide me with some proof and I’ll ban/delete/censor them as well.

The end.

Mopar i understand your rules but pkufast isnt the admin, hes some new guy that popped up and made the threat most likely to set up rschill.eu so he would get rschill in trouble… think about it man.
[/quote]
Or maybe you say that so RSChill doesn’t get banned?[/quote]

All Im saying is its illogical to assume that ‘PKUFAST’ is ddosing for RSChills admin when I have never seen ‘PKUFAST’ play or do anything else to contribute to the server. If we get taken down from Mopar because some random wants to make threats supporting our server by attacking another its ludacris. Ip0wns stated-
‘I haven’t gived out any ip to others.
Only google ip and some weird botnet ip…
And I think these arent ddos able…
And I don’t recomended anything about to ddos others.’

Problem solved, btw Nemesis I played as Joker on your server, you should know me well enough by now to be loyal to the server I play, Not to DGBPK that spammed RSChill and others because they have a low player base.

Read full topic

item.title: DGB-PK 24/7 uptime aka storm pk
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
@waj wrote:

[quote=“pkufast, post:59, topic:427044”][quote author=mikarm link=topic=529744.msg3901206#msg3901206 date=1327785371]

i hope some1 has a brain here and understands that we cant stop this ddosers if we dont ddos them back…

That makes no sense… Its like saying lets stop someone from being violent by beating the fuck out of them. It only creates more problems. It may or may not be dgb ddos’ing you, the only reason you think it is is because people came on the server saying so. That means nothing, I could go on rschill right now and say barney is ddosing you, that does not make it true.

It probably is DGB but I have not seen any solid proof.
[/quote]

Hey guess what, i could care less if it gets taken off mopar or not, The point is, im tired of it, so i handled it my way, and still currently am. Thanks. I usually wouldnt dos, But, its pissing me off, so i could care less if u have proof or not, we do.[/quote]
Oi retard, have you tried loading their forum? It loads instantly so very nice DoS.

Read full topic

item.title: DGB-PK 24/7 uptime aka storm pk
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
@waj wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:52, topic:427044”][quote author=pkufast link=topic=529744.msg3900757#msg3900757 date=1327744659]

stop ddosing u newbs now u come and hack our chars …to bad we take print screen and take items bank , your efforts to take rschill down are pointless no1 will join dgb it sucks bad …admin gives unlimited items to his friends…u kill them 12312 1times they will still come back with same items etc. u stake them 20k deaths ? np he will stkae 2000k more …admin gave him unilimited items. no point of playing this server they give items to friends , they ddos other servers , they hack other server .

Can you prove that they ‘ddos’ other servers?

As a matter of fact, yes they are, So idgaf what you say bud. thanks. =].

Well also, as to you, the owner of this server, I really suggest you stop. As a warning before shit happens. =]

Also mopar mod, we got proof, we going to prove it you however? No, because what could you do? Nothing. We will take care of it ourselfs. =]
[/quote]

Well, we can’t and won’t do anything outside of these forums for certain. But if this server has relations to ‘ddos’ attacking other servers, then that is unacceptable and against our rules of the forum, so we will remove their advertisement from this forum.

So if they are doing this, I would appreciate it if you could provide viable proof so we may take action.[/quote]
They can’t prove it, its all based on guessing and assuming, no facts what so ever.

Read full topic
